channel.title: Comments on: Why Orange River rafting was my best holiday ever

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/why-orange-river-rafting-was-my-best-holiday-ever/#comment-408">Siobhan</a>.
We went with Amanzi Trails, who were great. They're also the most affordable of all the options I researched.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Siobhan.

We went with Amanzi Trails, who were great. They’re also the most affordable of all the options I researched.

item.title: By: Siobhan
item.dc:creator: Siobhan
item.description: Which company did you do it through? Sounds awesome!!
item.content:encoded: Which company did you do it through? Sounds awesome!!

item.title: By: Meruschka
item.dc:creator: Meruschka
item.description: I've also been wanting to do this for years! Need to get my friends organised. Hopefully soon soon!
item.content:encoded: I’ve also been wanting to do this for years! Need to get my friends organised. Hopefully soon soon!

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description: It was perfect! You can always go on your own and join another group if none of your friends are keen.
item.content:encoded: It was perfect! You can always go on your own and join another group if none of your friends are keen.

item.title: By: Sid
item.dc:creator: Sid
item.description: Sounds perfect. I've wanted to do this for a while now, but I can't seem to convince any of my friends to join me.
item.content:encoded: Sounds perfect. I’ve wanted to do this for a while now, but I can’t seem to convince any of my friends to join me.
